{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer A7 |revision=v5.x |series=AC1750 |asin=B079JD7F7G |newegg=N82E16833704454 |price=80 |est_release_date=06/2018 |fcc_date=12/11/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Proware |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7C7V5 |ic_id=8853A-C7V5 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9563;QCA9563-AL3A, PK712CQ2, 1712, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed=750 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q128CSIG |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M14D1G1664A-2.5B |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9563;QCA9563-AL3A, PK712CQ2, 1712, TAIWAN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880;QCA9880-BR4A, FK7087MD, 1708, TAIWAN; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337N;QCA8337N-AL3C, PK702YW6, 1702, TAIWAN; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |flags=Alexa |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, DD-WRT, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TP-Link_XXXX, TP-Link_XXXX_5G |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|AC1750 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.tp-link.com/us/products/details/cat-9_Archer-A7.html}} {{•}} [https://www.tp-link.com/us/support/download/archer-a7/ Support page]
* Web GUI: http://tplinkwifi.net
The Multiple Listing document on the FCC says that the [[TP-LINK Archer C7 v5.x|Archer C7 v5]] and :[[TP-LINK Archer A7 v5.x|Archer A7 v5]] models are identical. But the flash layout is different. *[https://www.tp-link.com/us/support/alexa-compatibility/ ''Alexa compatibility for TP-Link Wi-Fi products'' on '''TP-LINK'''] {{See also|TP-LINK Archer C7 v5.x|TP-LINK}}
